confirmed.upgradeSuccess: Your plan has been upgraded successfully.
confirmed.downgradeSuccess: Your plan change has been scheduled successfully.
confirmed.nextBillWillBe: Your next bill will be {amount}/month for the {planName} plan.
confirmed.continueUsingFeatures: Continue using all {planName} features until the change date
confirmed.creditsWillReset: Your credits will reset to {credits} on the change date
confirmed.cancelChangeAnytime: You can cancel this change anytime before it takes effect
confirmed.newPlanActive: Your new plan is active now!
confirmed.accessToCredits: You now have access to {credits} credits per month.
confirmed.chargedForRemainder: You were charged {amount} for the remainder of this billing period.
confirmed.creditForUnusedTime: You received a {amount} credit for unused time.
confirmed.creditsRefreshStart: Credits refresh at the start of each billing cycle

checkout.pleaseSelectPlan: Please select a plan from the pricing page.
checkout.pleaseSignIn: Please sign in to continue with your purchase.
checkout.alreadyHaveActiveSubscription: You Already Have an Active Subscription
checkout.securedBySsl: Secured by 256-bit SSL encryption. All payments are processed securely by Stripe.

status.noActiveSubscriptionDesc: You don't have an active subscription. Browse our plans to get started!
status.trialEndsInfo: Your trial ends {time}. After the trial, you will be charged the regular subscription price.
status.subscriptionWillCancel: Your subscription will be canceled at the end of the period.

admin.immediatelyCancel: This will cancel the Stripe subscription immediately. User will lose access.
admin.removeAccess: This will remove subscription access from the user profile.
admin.changeToPlan: This will change the Stripe subscription to {planName}. Billing will be prorated.
admin.grantAccessWithoutStripe: This will grant {planName} access WITHOUT creating a Stripe subscription. Use for comps or testing only.
admin.irreversible: This action is irreversible. All user data including credits, subscriptions, and transaction history will be permanently deleted.
admin.grantAdminDesc: This will grant {email} full admin access to the admin panel, including the ability to manage users, credits, and subscriptions.
admin.removeAdminDesc: This will remove admin access from {email}. They will no longer be able to access the admin panel.
